hero.title: Modern distribution for labels and independent artists!
hero.text: Boost your music with a professional, transparent digital distribution solution designed to grow with you. At Modura Distribution, we simplify every stage of the process, giving you full control, efficiency, and reliable support so you can focus solely on creating.

service.title: What do we do?
service.text: We distribute your music to more than 100 digital stores and platforms worldwide. Our system is optimized for labels and artists seeking an agile, seamless experience with real tools to manage their catalog.

costs.title: Commission and costs
costs.noFees: No hidden fees, upfront payments, or subscriptions. At Modura, we only earn when you earn.

cards.title: Global distribution
cards.text: In more than 100 stores and DSPs.

cards.title: Smart splits system
cards.text: Ideal for labels and artist collaborations.

cards.title: Technical support and personalized attention
cards.text: Based on the needs of your label or project.

analytics.title: Analytics and reports
analytics.text: Monitor the performance of all your releases in real time. The dashboard allows access to:

cards.title: Daily statistics of streams and sales.
Complete reports
cards.text: Apple Music, Spotify, Beatport, iTunes and more.

cards.title: Royalty reports
cards.text: We issue royalty reports monthly, during the first week of each month.

cards.title: Payment request
cards.text: You can request payment starting at a minimum of $50 USD.

applications.title: Applications
applications.text: MODURA is open to labels and independent artists seeking serious, transparent distribution aligned with professional standards. Each application is carefully reviewed to ensure the overall quality of catalog.
